item.description:
This is one of Narragansett Cafe's Sunday series of "Blues, Bloodies and Brunch." Brunch begins at 11:30am. A great band - Superchief Trio - plays from 1-4pm. No cover charge. Superchief Trio's website
http://www.superchief...

Also, here is a nice article on the Narragansett Cafe http://www.jamestownp...

Check out their great website - http://www.narraganse...

--------------------------------------------------------

Also, please let us know of other events that you are interested in.
If possible, post your suggestions under the "IDEAS" tab so that members can vote on them. This way I can schedule the most popular ones.
item.how_to_find_us: Will have a Meetup sign on the table.

group.name: Mingle with singles 45+ Socializing and dancing

item.name: Brunch, music and dancing at Narragansett Cafe, Jamestown
